meaningMnemonic: You <radical>stand</radical> at a podium <radical>early</radical> in the morning to practice reading the <kanji>chapter</kanji> from your latest book.
readingMnemonic: You're practicing this specific <kanji>chapter</kanji> because you've been asked to read it for the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう). There will be a bunch of other authors reading chapters of their books to him too, and you want to make a good impression.
